question: What is the name of the first-ever luxury cruise service on the holy Saryu river  in Ayodhya, Uttar Pradesh?
explanation: Union Minister of Ports, Shipping and Waterway recently announced that the Ramayan Cruise Tour will be launched on the Saryu river in Ayodhya, Uttar Pradesh. It will be equipped with all the appropriate comfort facilities along with safety measures. The interior of the cruise  will be based on the theme of Ramcharitmanas.
